frame.nav: Three-mode digging provides optimal performance under a variety of different working conditions.
Exterior lighting makes it easy to see work during the low light of evening or early morning hours.
The standard dozer blade enhances the flexibility of the machine and is great for one-pass site preperation. It also comes in handy for backfilling and grading or site cleanup.
This cab is built for comfort and productivity. 7-way adjustable air suspension seat, reduced noise levels, intermittent wiper and tilted foot rest help reduce operator fatigue.
With a reduced counterweight overhang and minimal working width, the machine can work in tight spaces.
The long and wide crawler frame provides excellent stability in demanding work conditions.
Wide opening service panels provide fast access to daily service checkpoints from the ground level.
Wide opening service panels provide fast access to daily service checkpoints from the ground level.
Wide opening service panels provide fast access to daily service checkpoints from the ground level.
The unique propel circuit provides straight line travel, regardless of any other functions currently operating.
The upper swing shockless valve minimizes rebound motion at the end of the swing cycle for precise swing stops and more precise bucket placement.
Two-speed travel provides an ideal combination of speed and power.
